reviewText: These films are learning tools to show your Grand children what "The Red Menace" in the 1950's and 60's was all about!

OK DVD on 1950s nuclear fallout media. Has some fun 1950s footage. I showed it to my 11th grade class. Perhaps 50's kids bought off on this propaganda but my class didn't. I really wanted more complete 1950's coverage... film, music, news, culture, growth of America. But, this was a fun little DVD.
It is wonderful to find a Civil Defense DVD from the 1950's. Many years have passed but the information is still pertinent in today's world.
